column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////We were surprisingly pleased with our cocktails
column2: too.  My daughter got the margarita
column3: and we were both surprised at how strong it was because it looked like it would be extremely sweet.   And I give two thumbs up for my Old Fashioned with Maker's Mark.  So many places can mess this drink up
column4: but the bartender was on point!
